markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Ancient Tupilaq](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2512)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Construct](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)): DC 38

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 33
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 11">[Ancient Tupilaq](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2512)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Construct" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=35" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires](/Sources.aspx?ID=195) pg. 56</row>

**Perception** +22; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +24

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +7

**Dex** +5

**Con** +5

**Int** -5

**Wis** +5

**Cha** -5
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 32 

**Fort** +22 

**Ref** +20 

**Will** +18 

</row>

**HP** 145

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), necromancy, nonlethal attacks, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Construct Armor** Like normal objects, a tupilaq has Hardness. This Hardness reduces any damage it takes by an amount equal to the Hardness. Once a tupilaq is reduced to less than half its Hit Points, or immediately upon being damaged by a critical hit, its construct armor breaks, it loses its Hardness, and its Armor Class is reduced to 28.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet, swim 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +24 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 2d8+13 slashing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

** <%END>Primal Innate Spells** DC 30
- **5th**
[Lightning Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=172) (×3)

**Carver's Curse**   When a tupilaq is created, the curse imparted by its creator manifests in the form of a single 5th-level primal spell the tupilaq can cast three times per day. The particular spell is a reflection of the creator's wish for vengeance. By default, and for a found or summoned tupilaq, this spell is [_fireball_](/Spells.aspx?ID=119).

</column>
name: Ancient Tupilaq

This Hardness reduces any damage it takes by an amount equal to the Hardness. Once a tupilaq is reduced to less than half its Hit Points, or immediately upon being damaged by a critical hit, its construct armor breaks, it loses its Hardness, and its Armor Class is reduced to 28. --- Speed 40 feet, swim 40 feet Melee Single Action jaws +24 (Agile), Damage 2d8+13 slashing plus Grab <%END>Primal Innate Spells DC 30 - 5th Lightning Bolt (×3) Carver's Curse When a tupilaq is created, the curse imparted by its creator manifests in the form of a single 5th-level primal spell the tupilaq can cast three times per day. The particular spell is a reflection of the creator's wish for vengeance. By default, and for a found or summoned tupilaq, this spell is fireball .
